location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of letter no.3551 of 1860 from Henry Lacon Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to A W Lodwick, Civil Auditor

mods.abstract: The letter is related to the payment of arrears of salary to the heirs of the late Agent at Brymee [Al BuraymÄ«], following an initial enquiry by the Resident (folio 33), and copied to the Resident for reference.
